name: Bio Evil 4
description:
• Update 25 Aug 2018. Fixed super rapid firing bullets when using a controller.

Demade by @Gypopothomas and @AwesEmz

Music by @BibikiGL and @Clayzulah

Controls

TYPE WASD

A/D - walk

K - shoot

L -  jump

TYPE ARROWS

Left/Right - walk

Z - shoot

X - jump

TYPE CONTROLLER

Dpad left/right - walk

X - shoot

A - jump
